text: [[b]]Cao Ren[[/b]]\\nBrave Hunter\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The skills of a fearless outdoorsman - horse-riding, archery, and hunting - make Cao Ren a valued battlefield ally.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Cao Pi[[/b]]\\nPolitical Animal\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]"In war, you can only be killed once, but in politics, many times."[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Mi[[/b]]\\nSteadfast Loyalist\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Mi will do anything to protect her family - even if it means sacrificing herself.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Bian[[/b]]\\nHumble Matriarch\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]It takse patience and wisdom to manage the fractious brood that is the Cao family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yuan Shang[[/b]]\\nFavoured Son\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]To be chosen is an accolate in its own right. To take the reigns of one's own lineage? Perhaps that is a blessing.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yuan Tan[[/b]]\\nUnfavoured Son\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A prestigious lienage can be both a boon and a burdon - especially your father is as ambitious as Yuan Tan's.[[/col]][[/i]]
